messages.subject: Need Some Info on a Specific Samurai.

messages.messageBody:
I need urgente info about Toshiro Fujimoto - was it a samurai? - and i
also noticed that some Fujimoto 1 is mentiones in the Takeda Fall
article.

But it doesn't say more about his name or origins.

What can i do?


Eduardo.
